Package dat.backend.model.persistence

Class OrderMapper

java.lang.Object
dat.backend.model.persistence.OrderMapper
public class OrderMapper extends Object
This class contains all methods used to retrieve or alter order data in the database. Every method in this class is static, and an instance of this class is never needed.

  • Method Details

    • getOrdersByUserID

      static List<Order> getOrdersByUserID(int userID, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method retrieves a list of orders belonging to a specific user, from the database.
      Parameters:
      userID - user ID number - generated in the database.
      connectionPool - Required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      List of instances from the Order.java class - data for each instance is retrieved from the database.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there is no connection to the database, or if data retrieved from the database is invalid.

    • getItemListContentForOrder

      public static ItemList getItemListContentForOrder(int orderID, ItemList itemList, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method generates an instance of ItemList.java. Data for each ItemListMaterial element is retrieved from the itemListView view in the database, that matches the given order ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - ID number for the order you need the carport for.
      itemList - Empty ItemList that needs to filled with content for the given order.
      connectionPool - Required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      Carport including all the data it persists of.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there isn't a connection to the database or if the data in the database is invalid.

    • createOrder

      static Order createOrder(Carport carport, int userId, double price, double indicativePrice, ItemList itemList, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method creates an order object which is returned. Its also created in the database. If there is no shed connected to the carport, its values is set as 0 in the DB. This method is used when the customer orders a carport, which is why orderstatus is hard coded to be "pending"
      Parameters:
      carport - the Object, which will be generated with height, width and length from the user, later to be put into the order in the DB
      userId - ID number for the user, which the order is made for.
      price - Price is the final price for the order. (This will later be changeable for the admin)
      indicativePrice - The price which is predetermined, before the admin has made a deal.
      itemList - Is added return a list of items for each order when creating the object.
      connectionPool - Is required for establishing connection to the DB.
      Returns:
      Will return the order, which is being created by the method.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there isn't a connection to the database or if the data in the database is invalid.

    • updateOrderOrdered

      static void updateOrderOrdered(int orderId, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method will update the orderstatus for an order in the DB. Its used for changing the order which is visible in the shoppingbasket. for the user. After pressing "get offer", it will change the orderstatus from "pending" to "ordered".
      Parameters:
      orderId - Is the ID for the order itself.
      connectionPool - Is required for establishing connection to the DB.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there isn't a connection to the database or if the data in the database is invalid.

    • updateOrderPayed

      static int updateOrderPayed(int orderId, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method will update the orderstatus for an order in the DB to "payed". This method is used after pressing the "pay" button on the orderpage.
      Parameters:
      orderId - Is the ID for the order itself.
      connectionPool - Is required for establishing connection to the DB.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there isn't a connection to the database or if the data in the database is invalid.

    • addItemlistToDB

      static void addItemlistToDB(ItemList itemList, int orderId, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method will iterate through the hashmap which contains the materials needed for the carport. It will then be put into the DB.
      Parameters:
      itemList - The Hashmap of the materials. The key is the object of the material, while the value is the amount
      orderId - Is the ID for the order itself.
      connectionPool - Is required for establishing connection to the DB.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there isn't a connection to the database or if the data in the database is invalid.

    • getNewOrders

      static List<Order> getNewOrders(ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method returns a list of Order, where all orders have order status "ordered". This method is used on the admin "new orders" page.
      Parameters:
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      List of Order.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown if there isn't a valid connection to the database or if the data in the database is invalid.

    • deleteOrder

      static boolean deleteOrder(int orderID, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method deletes an order from the database, it deletes everything to do with the order in orders table and itemList table.
      Parameters:
      orderID - ID number for the order you want to delete.
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      True if both statements succeeded in removing lines.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown if there isn't a valid connection to the database.

    • sendOfferToCustomer

      static boolean sendOfferToCustomer(int orderID, double salesPrice, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method handles when an offer is sent to the customer. It changes the price to match the price entered by the salesperson and changes order status to confirmed.
      Parameters:
      orderID - required to identify correct order.
      salesPrice - Price entered by the salesperson.
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      true if there is changes at 1 line in the database.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown there is no connection to the database or if input data is invalid.

    • updateItemListForOrder

      static boolean updateItemListForOrder(int orderID, ItemList itemList, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method inserts a new item list for an order. It deletes every itemlist row for that order and inserts a line for each ItemListMaterial in the ItemList
      Parameters:
      orderID - Needed to recognise which order to change.
      itemList - An object that contains all the materials, messages, etc. for an order.
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      true if delete SQL query is successful.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - is thrown if there isn't any rows inserted in itemList table.

    • updateMeasurementsForOrder

      static boolean updateMeasurementsForOrder(int orderID, Carport carport, ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      This method updates every column in the order table for a specific order, except varying ids and the order status.
      Parameters:
      orderID - Needed to recognise which order to change.
      carport - An object of the carport that belongs to the order - it contains all the data needed to update everything needed.
      connectionPool - required to establish connection to the database.
      Returns:
      true if exactly 1 line is affected by the SQL query.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - Is thrown there is no connection to the database or if input data is invalid.

    • getAllOrders

      static List<Order> getAllOrders(ConnectionPool connectionPool) throws DatabaseException
      A method to retrieve all orders from DB, used on the admin allorder page.
      Parameters:
      connectionPool -
      Returns:
      a List of orders
      Throws:
      DatabaseException
